Class BaseBehaviorComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpg.game.actor.behavior.BaseBehaviorComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Behavior
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PositionBehavior2D

    public abstract class BaseBehaviorComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements Behavior
    Represents the base functionality and data required to represent a behavior.

      • act

        public abstract boolean act(int id)
        Required method from the Behavior interface. Causes the behavior to do whatever it does.
        Specified by:
        act in interface Behavior
        Returns:
        boolean True if the behavior was a success, and false otherwise. Purpose of the return depends on the system calling act().

      • actOn

        public abstract boolean actOn(int id,
            Actor other)
        Required method from the Behavior interface. Causes the behavior to do whatever it does to the passed actor.
        Specified by:
        actOn in interface Behavior
        Returns:
        boolean True if the behavior was a success, and false otherwise. Purpose of the return depends on the system calling act().
